title: Swimming in the primary school
creator_credit: Derek Monk and Educational Foundation for Visual Aids
brief_description:
This film studies swimming lessons with junior children showing three levels: a class of beginners; a mixed-ability class; and a class in which all the children can swim and are working to make their strokes more efficient and to build up stamina.
Suitable for upper primary level.
